translations.en: Were you looking for me just now?
translations.zh: 你剛剛在找我嗎？

translations.en: It’s okay to exit, we’re in practice mode XD
translations.zh: 可以退出去，我們在練習模式 XD

translations.en: I’m only taking on an easy boss, I can head over anytime.
translations.zh: 我只是打簡單的王，隨時可以過去。

translations.en: They already played CV this week haha.
translations.zh: 他們這週已經打過 CV 了哈哈。

translations.en: They all finished playing XD last week.
translations.zh: 他們都打完了 XD，在上週。

translations.en: Are you going to play the next round? @@
translations.zh: 你還要打下一場嗎 @@？

translations.en: I’ll go solo the boss first, be back later.
translations.zh: 我先去 SOLO 王，等會回來。

translations.en: Vvbrz doesn’t know how to play.
translations.zh: Vvbrz 不會玩。

translations.en: We’re just wasting our time xd
translations.zh: 我們只是在浪費時間 xd

translations.en: He doesn’t know how to play pala at all.
translations.zh: 他根本不會玩聖騎。

translations.en: Yes, I’m on my way.
translations.zh: 是的，我正在過去。

translations.en: What are you guys doing here? haha
translations.zh: 你們在這邊做甚麼 哈哈?

translations.en: We were so close to passing.
translations.zh: 我們差一點就過了 QQ

translations.en: I’m gonna solo the boss first.
translations.zh: 我先去 solo 打王

translations.en: It’s my first time playing too.
translations.zh: 我也是第一次玩

translations.en: I’m going to the bathroom first, wait for me.
translations.zh: 我先去廁所等我一下

translations.en: I’ll switch to another character to fight the boss first.
translations.zh: 我先切換其他角色打王

translations.en: I don’t have any keys left, sorry, and thanks everyone.
translations.zh: 我沒有鑰匙了 抱歉 感謝各位

translations.en: If you’re interested, you can join Discord to chat together.
translations.zh: 如果你有興趣 可以加入DC一起聊天

translations.en: You can open the event interface on the left; it has an introduction.
translations.zh: 你可以打開左邊的活動介面 上面有介紹

translations.en: Does anyone want to fight the Boss together?
translations.zh: 有人要一起打Boss嗎?

translations.en: I’m from Taiwan. Where are you from?
translations.zh: 我來自台灣?你來自哪裡

translations.en: Everyone remember to check in, you can earn character honor points~
translations.zh: 大家記得簽到 可以拿角色榮譽值呦~

translations.en: Does anyone in your guild want to come over and play together?
translations.zh: 你公會有人可以過來一起玩嗎?

translations.en: Have you finished all your bosses this week?
translations.zh: 你這週的boss都完成了嗎？

translations.en: Extract common code
translations.zh: 提取共用程式碼

translations.en: The left-hand side of an assignment expression may not be an optional property access.
translations.zh: 賦值表達式的左側不能是可選的屬性存取。

translations.en: Standardize the resolution on the VIP page by using device Width Ratio.
translations.zh: 修改vip page 解析度統一使用 deviceWidthRatio

translations.en: Is a higher graphics card memory always better?
translations.zh: 顯卡記憶體越高越好嗎？

translations.en: What can gesture-handler do?
translations.zh: gesture-handler 作用是什麼 ？

translations.en: Fix: handle null URL returned from backend
translations.zh: 修復後端回傳 null URL 的問題

translations.en: Removes the leading and trailing whitespace and line terminator characters from a string.
translations.zh: 從字串中移除前後的空白字元以及換行符號。

translations.en: Add Chinese comments and explain each line step by step
translations.zh: 加上中文註解與逐行解釋

translations.en: Please provide me with the most efficient solution.
translations.zh: 請給我一個效能最好的解決方法

translations.en: I have updated the UI display condition.
translations.zh: 我更新了UI顯示的條件

translations.en: Implement a function that takes an input number and randomly selects six unique numbers from 1 to that number.
translations.zh: 實作input為1到該數字的隨機取六個不重複數字

translations.en: OK, I'll report to my manager that this ticket is still pending testing.
translations.zh: ok,那我先跟主管回報,這個單子待測試

translations.en: This task/order was completed last September, but it has never been tested.
translations.zh: 這張單去年9月就完成了 不過一直沒有測試

translations.en: Hi Chris, I'm leaving for a new job next week. I wanted to confirm if this task/order needs to be processed?
translations.zh: hi,chris,我下週要離職去新工作了,這邊想確認這張單需要上嗎?

translations.en: Hi, is this ticket about modifying the text color format below?
translations.zh: 請問這張單的需求是修改下面的文字顏色格式嗎?

translations.en: I think the normal situation should be that data can only be retrieved with a token, and without a token, data cannot be accessed.
translations.zh: 我認為正常的狀況應該是有帶token 才能取得資料,沒帶token無法取得資料

translations.en: Modify CustomVerticalScrollView to add customizable properties, allowing external definition of component styles.
translations.zh: 修改CustomVerticalScrollView 新增客製化屬性,外部可定義組件樣式

translations.en: If the new variable doesn't exist, show 'Post' by default.
translations.zh: 新增變數不存在時預設顯示帖子

translations.en: Should we do something if the text is too long?
translations.zh: 這邊如果文字過長有需要做處理嗎@@?

translations.en: Where did you click to make this image appear? @@?
translations.zh: 這張圖是哪裡點擊出現的呀@@?

translations.en: Hi, this account's mission has expired. Do you have any other accounts? @@?
translations.zh: hi 這個帳號任務已過期,還有其他帳號嗎@@?

translations.en: It looks like they don’t match at all XD. There’s probably a difference between the app and WAP versions.
translations.zh: 目前看來是完全對不上XD 應該是app跟wap的版本是有差異的

translations.en: Tickets 8845, and 8858 have been fixed and deployed to SIT.
translations.zh: ticket 8845跟8858 已修復部署到sit

translations.en: Hi, I have a question regarding the Account Statement Page. Is it different from a standard Deposit/Withdraw?
translations.zh: hi,關於 Account Statement Page我有疑問,這個跟一般的Deposit/Ｗithdraw不同嗎？

translations.en: The account listed on the ticket is unable to claim it.
translations.zh: 票子上的帳號無法領取

translations.en: Can you enable my account to claim it? I'll test it and let you know.
translations.zh: 你可以設定讓我的帳號可以領取嗎？我測試一下在給你

translations.en: Alright, I'll update it this way first.
translations.zh: 好的,那我先改這樣

translations.en: hi,There’s no image from the art team. Is this the way you want it to be changed?
translations.zh: 這張美術沒有給圖,這是你想要修改的樣子嗎？

translations.en: Hi, could you please provide a new image with the updated text? Since the text is embedded in the image, we need a new version. Thanks!
translations.zh: hi,這個單子的圖片需要麻煩您提供新文字的圖,因為文字與圖片在一起

translations.en: I just saw that he didn't transfer the orders to me XD. I'll start fixing them tomorrow!
translations.zh: 我剛才看到他都沒有轉單子給我XD,明天我會開始修復

translations.en: If the order is related to the A offer, please transfer all of them to me. I am responsible for this part. Thank you!
translations.zh: 如果是A offer部分的單子,請全部轉給我,這部分是我負責的

translations.en: I don't think we need to use the new UI.
translations.zh: 我覺得我們不需要用新UI

translations.en: Since there's no UI design yet, we’ll just use the default pop-up message for now. Is that okay?
translations.zh: 因為目前沒有畫UI,那我們就用預設的pop up message 可以嗎？

translations.en: I just want to confirm, we only need to add this feature in (Forum/Discover), right?
translations.zh: 我想確認一下目前只需在（論壇/發現）兩個地方加此功能,對嗎？

translations.en: OK, I tested it, and it works! I can download it now.
translations.zh: OK,我測試可以下載了

translations.en: Hi, I don’t see a download option for this image. Could you please grant us permission to download it? Thank you!
translations.zh: hi,這個圖片我沒有下載選項,可以麻煩開放給我們權限下載嗎？謝謝

translations.en: Great, convert this section of the file into a markdown (.md) file for me.
translations.zh: 很好，幫我將這部分轉換為 markdown (.md) 給我。

translations.en: Haven't you met him yet?
translations.zh: 你還沒見過他嗎@@?

translations.en: I feel like I've missed out on a lot.
translations.zh: 感覺我錯過了很多事

translations.en: What format will the data become after using this?
translations.zh: 使用這個後資料會變成甚麼格式?

translations.en: Why do you have to work today?
translations.zh: 為甚麼你今天要上班呀?

translations.en: Refactor File Naming Conventions
translations.zh: 重構文件命名約定

translations.en: I’ll have to claim before you visit again
translations.zh: 在您再次訪問之前我必須先聲明

translations.en: Otherwise none of you will get energy from trade
translations.zh: 否則你們誰都不會從貿易中獲得能量

translations.en: Hi can somebody help me with removing an object?
translations.zh: 你好，有人可以幫我移除一個物體嗎？

translations.en: People always need to have dreams
translations.zh: 人總是要有夢想

translations.en: My life still has so many things left unfinished.
translations.zh: 我的人生還有很多事沒做完

translations.en: I've been so loyal and cooperative with you, yet you suddenly want to hit me. QQ
translations.zh: 我那麼忠心的配合你,你遽然想打我QQ

translations.en: Because we agreed to practice English together.
translations.zh: 因為我們說好一起練英文

translations.en: The world is big, and you are amazing.
translations.zh: 世界很大,你很棒

translations.en: I’m grinding problems on LeetCode every day.
translations.zh: 我每天都在 LeetCode 上刷題。

translations.en: Got it. Please notify me and arrange the testing.
translations.zh: 可以,再麻煩通知安排測試

translations.en: I'm just here to remind you, haha.
translations.zh: 我只是來提醒哈哈

translations.en: Good morning, are you still tied up with SMH?
translations.zh: 早,您這邊還在忙smh嗎？

translations.en: I see you also got called in to work over the weekend, QQ.
translations.zh: 我看你假日也被叫上線了QQ

translations.en: Or do we not need to replace it?
translations.zh: 還是我們不需要替換呀@@?

translations.en: May I ask which page of the document contains the translation for this page?
translations.zh: 想請問這個頁面的翻譯在文件的哪個頁面?

translations.en: You can clearly see that the text quantity and colors displayed are completely different from the app. I'm worried no one will notice, and everyone will end up redoing it later XD.
translations.zh: 主要是可以看到他顯示的文字數量跟顏色都跟app完全不一樣，我怕沒人發現，到時候大家都重做一次XD。

translations.en: Is this UI ready? I have time to work on it now.
translations.zh: 請問這個UI有了嗎？我這邊有空做了

translations.en: I think you have a good chance.
translations.zh: 我認為你有一個很好的機會。

translations.en: Is that person a girl?
translations.zh: 那個人是女孩嗎？

translations.en: Since he is willing to go out with you a second time, it means he likes you.
translations.zh: 既然他願意跟你出來第二次 代表他對你有好感

translations.en: As long as you're here, nothing is a problem.
translations.zh: 只要有你在 什麼都不是問題

translations.en: Change him with love
translations.zh: 用愛去感化他

translations.en: He may still feel awkward
translations.zh: 他可能還是覺得尷尬

translations.en: Update the unused backend API.
translations.zh: 修正已無使用的後端API

translations.en: Is he a foreigner?
translations.zh: 他是外國人嗎？

translations.en: He may feel uncomfortable due to language problem
translations.zh: 他可能會因為語言問題而感到不舒服

translations.en: Remember to invite me to your wedding next year.
translations.zh: 明年記得請我喝喜酒

translations.en: You never know unless you ask, right?
translations.zh: 總是要問問看才有機會嘛,對吧？

translations.en: I bet he wouldn't want to come
translations.zh: 我打賭他不想來

translations.en: but he is pretty introverted
translations.zh: 但他很內向

translations.en: His appearance perfectly matches
translations.zh: 他的外表很配

translations.en: You can have both love and bread
translations.zh: 你可以愛情跟麵包同時擁有呀

translations.en: Is he your type
translations.zh: 他是你的菜嗎？

translations.en: That means he cares about you
translations.zh: 代表他在乎你

translations.en: He saved his precious scheduled leave for me
translations.zh: 他為我節省了寶貴的預定假期

translations.en: Are you going to meet the handsome young man
translations.zh: 那你要去跟小鮮肉見面嗎？

translations.en: I would like to learn more about cryptocurrency recently
translations.zh: 我最近想了解更多關於加密貨幣的知識

translations.en: I invest in stock markets for long-term growth rather than short-term trading
translations.zh: 我投資股票市場是為了長期成長而不是短期交易

translations.en: Do you usually invest in stocks?
translations.zh: 你平常會投資股票嗎?

translations.en: Sounds great
translations.zh: 聽起來很棒

translations.en: Hi, according to Ray's response, he mentioned that he got version 0.9 from QA, but the link I checked is version 0.7. Do we have an updated link?
translations.zh: hi,根據ray的回覆 他說他有從QA手上拿到0.9版本,但是這個連結我查看是0.7,我們有更新的連結嗎

translations.en: Sure, please give me a moment.
translations.zh: 當然，請給我一點時間。

translations.en: Could you give me the dc link?
translations.zh: 能給我dc連結嗎？

translations.en: Many people also don't speak, they just go up to listen to the chat like a podcast while coding.
translations.zh: 很多人也是不講話,上去當podcast聽聊天,然後coding

translations.en: You might consider joining DC, where we often discuss code and do live coding chats.
translations.zh: 你可以考慮加入DC,我們常常在上面討論程式碼與聊天直播CODING

translations.en: After the event, when we get back home, we can do voice coding and discuss programming together.
translations.zh: 活動結束後,回到家我們可以一起語音交流寫程式

translations.en: Then we can cancel the coffee shop plan for now. I'll go with you to this event instead.
translations.zh: 那可以把咖啡廳活動先取消,我陪你去這個活動

translations.en: The main reason is that I use multiple monitors for coding, which allows me to work on projects much more efficiently.XD
translations.zh: 主要是我coding會使用多個螢幕開發程式,這樣可以非常有效率地做專案

translations.en: We can try coding together at a coffee shop.
translations.zh: 我們可以試著到咖啡館一起coding

translations.en: I think going to a coffee shop gives a different vibe.XD
translations.zh: 我認為去咖啡館是不一樣的感覺

translations.en: rather than at a cafe?
translations.zh: 而不是在咖啡館？

translations.en: I’m more likely to hide at home and write code XD
translations.zh: 我比較有可能躲在家裡寫程式XD

translations.en: Looks good? I'll consider it.
translations.zh: 看起來不錯?我會考慮看看

translations.en: OK, please open your Line Pay account.
translations.zh: OK,請開啟你的line pay 帳戶

translations.en: Good morning! Is there anything I can help you with?
translations.zh: 早安 有什麼我可以幫助你的嗎?

translations.en: I’d like to ask, on which page can I find the translation for this page?
translations.zh: 我想請問這個頁面翻譯在哪一頁?

translations.en: Or is there a more updated document available?
translations.zh: 還是我們有更新的文檔？

translations.en: Hi CY, good morning! I’d like to ask if this URL contains the latest translations?
translations.zh: HI,CY早,我想問這個網址是最新的翻譯嗎？

translations.en: Add automatic language swap feature.
translations.zh: 新增自動交換語系功能

translations.en: This is two different features.
translations.zh: 這是兩個不同的功能

translations.en: Normal process: We need to determine whether this user receives different fee percentages based on their account.
translations.zh: 正常流程:我們需要知道這個用戶是否根據帳號獲取不同的手續費百分比

translations.en: Therefore, the backend should return the percentage to the frontend as soon as the page loads.
translations.zh: 所以後端應該在頁面一進入時回傳百分比給前端

translations.en: Alternatively, this part of the UI could be removed.
translations.zh: 或者移除這部分的ui

translations.en: Would it be strange to display the handling fee directly?
translations.zh: 直接顯示手續費會不會很奇怪？

translations.en: For the handling fee at points 13 and 14 in the user interface, how would you like it to be presented?
translations.zh: 對於第13/14點手續費部分使用者UI,您這邊想如何呈現?

translations.en: OK, then I will handle them separately. PIX and Bank will each have their own independent screens.
translations.zh: OK,那我拆開來做 PIX/Bank都是獨立畫面

translations.en: Currently, we only have PIX. Should we implement it following the bank's UI?
translations.zh: 我們目前只有pix 是一樣依照銀行的ui去實作嗎?

translations.en: Are PIX and Bank separate screens, or do they share the same screen?
translations.zh: 是PIX/Bank都是獨立畫面 還是共用畫面?

translations.en: Remove unnecessary files
translations.zh: 移除不必要檔案

translations.en: At the core, only the supervisor should be able to control your two permissions. The company's processes should be improved.
translations.zh: 從本質上講，只有主管才能控制你的兩個權限。公司的流程應該要改進。

translations.en: it's just that people often fail to understand each other's perspectives.
translations.zh: 只是人們常常無法理解彼此的觀點。

translations.en: I'm not sure when the final version will be ready; the UI keeps changing.
translations.zh: 不曉得什麼時候會有最終版 UI一直改

translations.en: I'm still working hard on modifying the Withdrawal and Deposit V4 versions XD.
translations.zh: 我還在努力改Withdrawal 跟deposit V4版本XD

translations.en: Okay, I'll package a version right away.
translations.zh: ok,我馬上打包一版

translations.en: Modify the domain key name based on backend requirements.
translations.zh: 根據後端需求修改domain key 名稱

translations.en: OK, the lucky wheel issue is a backend problem. The backend will return the lucky wheel domain.
translations.zh: ok,幸運輪問題是後端的問題,後端會回傳幸運輪domain 英文怎麼說

translations.en: I mean, why did you respond to the withdrawal issue with the lucky wheel ticket? XD
translations.zh: 我意思是,為什麼你回覆的提款問題 貼的是幸運輪工單XD

translations.en: I’d like to ask if this option will be hidden.
translations.zh: 想問這個選項會隱藏嗎？

translations.en: Good morning, may I ask if Zeplin currently provides the UI for this screen? Based on the web version, the color theme seems to differ significantly.
translations.zh: 早,請問目前zeplin可以提供這個畫面的UI嗎?目前參照網頁部分看起來顏色主題差異過大

translations.en: Hi, I need the new images for all VIP levels. Where can I get them?
translations.zh: 我需要vip所有等級的新圖片@@ 請問我可以去哪裡拿?

translations.en: I just fixed it. I'll finish fixing all the tasks and package them into one version for you.
translations.zh: 我剛剛修掉了,我全部單子一起修完再給你包一版

translations.en: I've tested four work orders here, and they are all in UAT. Try the hot update on your side.
translations.zh: 我這邊測試四張工單都在uat了,你熱更新試試

translations.en: Issue #2: What is the expected outcome or changes?
translations.zh: Issue #2 期望要改成什麼樣子？

translations.en: Since the order status is in SIT, I won't move it to UAT.
translations.zh: 因為單子狀態在sit我不會換到uat

translations.en: Should I just directly change the order status to UAT test afterward?
translations.zh: 那我之後直接把單子狀態都切到uat test@@?

translations.en: Sure, please update Zeplin when you have time. Since we currently have standalone page UIs, we've created two versions.
translations.zh: OK 麻煩有空請更新Zeplin,因為目前有獨立頁面Page UI 所以我們做了兩個版本

translations.en: Hi lee, will we still have a standalone offer page, or will everything be unified under the Offer Center?
translations.zh: hi 李,目前我們還會有獨立的offer page頁面嗎？還是統一進入 offer center

translations.en: kindly take note about this as well
translations.zh: 也請注意這部分。

translations.en: Currently, I can't retrieve the trendChart domain in the settings. Has anything been changed in this part?
translations.zh: 目前在settings拿不到trendChart Domain,想請問這部分有改什麼嗎? 英文怎麼說

translations.en: Enter the JWT Token directly, without adding the 'Bearer ' prefix.
translations.zh: 直接輸入 JWT Token，不需加上 'Bearer ' 前綴

translations.en: May I ask if the new offers mission still requires the promotion page? I currently can't find the page style in Zeplin.
translations.zh: 請問新的offers mission還需要promotion這個頁面嗎? 目前在zeplin styles找不到頁面樣式

translations.en: How could you leave me all alone in this world?
translations.zh: 你怎麼能丟下我一個人在這個世界上？

translations.en: I gave you everything, and you still left me. Why?
translations.zh: 我給了你一切，你卻還是離開了我。為什麼？

translations.en: Move the copyText function to a shared function file named languagePracticeTool.
translations.zh: 將copyText fn 移到共用 fn檔案 languagePracticeTool

translations.en: Refactor user deposit-related files.
translations.zh: 重構user deposit 相關檔案

translations.en: I usually take freelance projects on weekends.
translations.zh: 我平時假日有在接案

translations.en: The initial version of the Deposit app has been deployed. If you have time, please help arrange testing. Thank you.
translations.zh: 存款應用程式的初始版本已部署。如果您有時間，請幫忙安排測試。謝謝。

translations.en: The App version of the Transfer app has been deployed. If you have time, please help arrange testing. Thank you.
translations.zh: Transfer應用程式的App版本已部署。如果您有時間，請幫忙安排測試。謝謝。

translations.en: Should we keep the amount?
translations.zh: 那我們金額保留嗎?

translations.en: Can we let the UI create the schematic?
translations.zh: 我們可以讓 UI 建立原理圖嗎？

translations.en: Revise New Withdrawal Standards (Tentative)
translations.zh: 修改新提款標準(暫定)

translations.en: Error occasionally occurs during login. Is the backend being deployed?
translations.zh: 登入時不時會出現error, 請問後端有在部署嗎？

translations.en: The username or account already exists. Please use a different name.
translations.zh: 使用者名稱或帳號已存在，請使用不同的名稱

translations.en: User created successfully.
translations.zh: 使用者創建成功

translations.en: User creation failed.
translations.zh: 使用者創建失敗

translations.en: User does not exist.
translations.zh: 使用者不存在

translations.en: Incorrect password.
translations.zh: 密碼不正確

translations.en: Unable to retrieve user ID.
translations.zh: 無法獲取使用者 ID

translations.en: The device has been successfully removed.
translations.zh: 設備已成功刪除

translations.en: It is great, but it will be better to use voice chat.
translations.zh: 很棒，但使用語音聊天會更好

translations.en: Actually, we can practice speaking English directly in the sheep group.
translations.zh: 其實我們可以直接在綿羊群用英文練習對話

translations.en: If the index doesn't exist, log it for later review.
translations.zh: 如果不存在的index要存起來印出看LOG

translations.en: I separated the tags from the JSON and created a standalone tags JSON.
translations.zh: 我把tag從json分離獨立成tag json

translations.en: Let's chat later.
translations.zh: 我們稍後再聊吧。

translations.en: It’s been a pleasure working with you.
translations.zh: 與您合作很愉快。

translations.en: Let’s make sure to celebrate our achievements, no matter how small.
translations.zh: 讓我們確保慶祝我們的成就，不管它們多麼微小。

translations.en: Please reach out if you have any questions or need assistance.
translations.zh: 如有任何問題或需要協助，請隨時聯繫我。

translations.en: Let’s create a list of action items from our meeting today.
translations.zh: 讓我們從今天的會議中創建一個行動項目清單。

translations.en: Are there any specific areas of concern that we need to address?
translations.zh: 我們是否需要解決任何特定的問題？

translations.en: I appreciate your help with this project, it means a lot to me.
translations.zh: 感謝您對這個項目的幫助，這對我來說意義重大。

translations.en: Let’s ensure that all team members are on the same page regarding project goals.
translations.zh: 讓我們確保所有團隊成員對專案目標有相同的理解。

translations.en: Can you help me to understand the workflow better?
translations.zh: 您能幫我更好地理解工作流程嗎？

translations.en: It’s important to maintain a clean and organized code structure.
translations.zh: 保持乾淨有序的代碼結構是很重要的。

translations.en: We will establish a knowledge base for our project to assist future team members.
translations.zh: 我們將為專案建立一個知識庫，以幫助未來的團隊成員。

translations.en: Make sure to document any changes made to the codebase.
translations.zh: 確保記錄對代碼庫所做的任何更改。

translations.en: It’s crucial that everyone stays updated on the project’s status.
translations.zh: 每個人都能保持專案狀態的更新是至關重要的。

translations.en: I’ll send you the meeting invite as soon as we finalize the schedule.
translations.zh: 一旦我們確定了時間表，我會馬上發送會議邀請給您。

translations.en: Let’s set up a schedule for our weekly meetings to discuss progress.
translations.zh: 讓我們設定每週會議的時間表以討論進展。

translations.en: Our team can provide feedback on your implementation to improve it further.
translations.zh: 我們團隊可以對您的實現提供反饋，以進一步改進。

translations.en: Let’s conduct a code review session before the next deployment.
translations.zh: 讓我們在下次部署之前進行一次代碼審查會議。

translations.en: I will ensure that all new code is covered by tests before it gets deployed.
translations.zh: 我會確保所有新代碼在部署之前都有測試覆蓋。

translations.en: Can you set up unit tests for our new features?
translations.zh: 您能為我們的新功能設置單元測試嗎？

translations.en: We can use tools like Postman or Swagger for testing our API.
translations.zh: 我們可以使用Postman或Swagger等工具來測試我們的API。

translations.en: Can you suggest any tools for monitoring our API performance?
translations.zh: 您能建議任何工具來監控我們的API性能嗎？

translations.en: Our API will receive many requests simultaneously, and it needs to handle them efficiently.
translations.zh: 我們的API將會同時接收到許多請求，並且需要有效地處理它們。

translations.en: I’ll review our database queries to see if any optimizations can be made.
translations.zh: 我會檢查我們的數據庫查詢，以查看是否可以進行優化。

translations.en: Is it possible to reduce the loading time of our API responses?
translations.zh: 是否有可能減少我們API響應的加載時間？

translations.en: What kind of performance improvements can I expect?
translations.zh: 我可以期待什麼樣的性能改善？

translations.en: In addition to fixing bugs, I can also work on optimizing the database performance.
translations.zh: 除了修復錯誤外，我還可以致力於優化資料庫性能。

translations.en: You can focus on other areas after clearing this issue.
translations.zh: 在解決此問題後，您可以專注於其他領域。

translations.en: You can move on to your next task after you finish this one.
translations.zh: 在完成這項工作後，您可以進入下一個任務。

translations.en: Let’s also add a button to display the card details.
translations.zh: 讓我們也添加一個按鈕來顯示卡片詳情。

translations.en: Can you add an entry for the countdown timer to the create button?
translations.zh: 可以在創建按鈕上添加倒計時器的條目嗎？

translations.en: You can start developing this API while waiting for the opening.
translations.zh: 在等待開通的過程中，您可以先開始開發這個API。

translations.en: Could you please let me know who I can contact to get access opened?
translations.zh: 您能否告訴我可以聯絡誰來開通存取權限？

translations.en: Currently, we are using https://www.google.com/
translations.zh: 目前我們是使用https://www.google.com/

translations.en: May I ask which domain this API will be deployed to?
translations.zh: 請問這個api會部署到哪一個domain?

translations.en: Anna, the world needs you to step up and save it!
translations.zh: Anna需要你出來拯救世界了。

translations.en: I've called the API, but it's returning a 404 error.
translations.zh: 我有呼叫了api會404錯誤。

translations.en: It’s sad, but I’m not surprised.
translations.zh: 是很難過，但我不意外。

translations.en: I researched mathematical algorithms and created custom RGB effects for these devices, offering features that are different from those available on the market.
translations.zh: 我研究了數學演算法並為這些設備創建了自訂RGB效果，提供了與市場上可用的功能不同的功能。

translations.en: JavaScript, because in my nine-year career, every job has involved JavaScript in some capacity. I also use JavaScript for side projects after work or on weekends.
translations.zh: JavaScript，因為在我九年的職業生涯中，每項工作都以某種方式涉及JavaScript。我也會在下班後或週末使用JavaScript進行業餘專案。

translations.en: Especially since I have to handle both SMH and this one at the same time.
translations.zh: 畢竟要同時做smh跟這個。

translations.en: So I probably won't be too happy about it.
translations.zh: 所以我應該是不會開心XD。

translations.en: I heard this project is really rushed.
translations.zh: 聽說這個案子很趕。

translations.en: He said he will give me an update next week to decide when to start the development.
translations.zh: 他說下週會給我消息決定何時開發。

translations.en: What I know so far is that MC is working on infrastructure development and deciding which project to use as the foundation.
translations.zh: 到目前為止我所知道的是MC正在處理基礎設施開發，並選擇使用哪個專案作為基礎。

translations.en: It seems like I won’t be able to avoid getting involved.
translations.zh: 我應該是跑不掉要參與。

translations.en: Updated services and controllers to use the new DI setup.
translations.zh: 更新服務和控制器使用新的DI設定。

translations.en: Improved clarity of dependency management across the application.
translations.zh: 提高整體應用程式依賴關係清晰度。

translations.en: Refactor user avatar logic and user authentication logic.
translations.zh: 重構使用者頭像邏輯與user檢查帳密邏輯。

translations.en: Hi L, do you have any SMH agent account in SIT/UAT that can borrow me to do a testing? Thank you.
translations.zh: 你好，L，你在SIT/UAT有SMH代理帳戶可以借我來做測試嗎？謝謝。

translations.en: Sorry to bother you, but do you have multiple agent accounts on the SMH platform? I need them for testing.
translations.zh: 打擾下,請問smh平台你有很多代理的帳號嗎?我需要做測試。

translations.en: Refactor GetUserChatrooms using MongoDB's aggregation pipeline for data composition.
translations.zh: 使用MongoDB的聚合管道重構GetUserChatrooms以進行資料組合。

translations.en: A D should not be constructed with duplicate key names, as that can cause undefined server behavior.
translations.zh: D應該避免使用重複的鍵名，因為這可能會導致伺服器行為異常。

translations.en: If the order of the elements does not matter, an M should be used instead.
translations.zh: 如果元素的順序不重要，則應使用M代替。

translations.en: This type should be used when the order of the elements matters.
translations.zh: 當元素的順序很重要時，應該使用這種類型。

translations.en: D is an ordered representation of a BSON document.
translations.zh: D是BSON文件的一種有序表示方式。

translations.en: Do we also need to have a return and a title?
translations.zh: 那一樣要有返回跟標題嗎？

translations.en: Is this feature designed to open the mobile browser directly, or do we need to set up a page for it?
translations.zh: 這個功能是為了直接開啟手機瀏覽器而設計的，還是需要我們為其設定一個頁面？

translations.en: Modify the shard's dependency injection and move it to the index file.
translations.zh: 修改shard的依賴注入移到index檔案。

translations.en: I’m at an age that is well-suited for being with you.
translations.zh: 我是很適合跟你在一起的年齡。

translations.en: Remove the loop calling BroadcastToUsers and change it to a single input.
translations.zh: 移除迴圈呼叫BroadcastToUsers改成一次性輸入。

translations.en: Remove field [NotificationOn] from the struct.
translations.zh: 移除結構中的NotificationOn欄位。

translations.en: Add segmented loading functionality to the API.
translations.zh: 新增api分段加載功能。

translations.en: Modify the TypeScript-style code in lotterHistoryData.js/slider.js to resolve issues when applied in JavaScript.
translations.zh: 修改lotterHistoryData.js/slider.js ts寫法用在js的問題。

translations.en: Add a 'lint:error' script to the package.json file.
translations.zh: 將“lint:error”腳本加入到 package.json 檔案中。

translations.en: Add feature to send notifications to all chatroom users.
translations.zh: 新增推播給所有聊天室使用者功能

translations.en: Your microphone has no sound.
translations.zh: 你的麥克風沒有聲音

translations.en: Hi, could you insert game records into my account from the back end? I need them for testing.
translations.zh: hi,請問您這邊可以從後端塞遊戲紀錄進我的帳號嗎?我才能測試 謝謝

translations.en: Please let me know if there are any specific changes needed, and I will make the necessary adjustments.
translations.zh: Ok,如果有具體的改動再麻煩告知我,我配合修改

translations.en: If the app isn't updated, please let me know.
translations.zh: 如果app沒更新,請跟我說

translations.en: Hey, do you know who is responsible for the backend? I'd like to contact them to insert some data.
translations.zh: cy,想問你知道這個後端是誰負責嗎@@? 我去找他塞資料好了

translations.en: So, after you finish writing the backend, would you still want to write more?
translations.zh: 所以你寫後端後還會想寫嗎？@@

translations.en: Didn't we agree to practice English together? QQ
translations.zh: 我們不是說好要一起練英文嗎？QQ

translations.en: What functionalities does your backend need to have?
translations.zh: 你後端要做什麼功能?

translations.en: A birthday of a very cute girl.
translations.zh: 一個很可愛的女生的生日

translations.en: I would like to confirm the requirements.
translations.zh: 我想確認一下這張單需求

translations.en: That's a great approach. I'll consider it for future optimizations as well.
translations.zh: 很好的做法,我以後也參考優化一下

translations.en: I'm okay with either. Whatever you think is more convenient.
translations.zh: 我都可以,看你覺得哪個比較方便

translations.en: If you find anything that needs to be changed or is unclear, let me know and I will make the necessary revisions.
translations.zh: 嗯,你如果覺得哪裡需要改或不清楚跟我說,我會去改

translations.en: I have 8 years of software engineering experience. I currently mainly do [React Native] mobile front-end work.
translations.zh: 我有8年的軟體工程經驗，目前主要做[React Native]的行動前端工作。

translations.en: If someone says something impolite, you could say this~
translations.zh: 如果有人說了不禮貌的話，你可以這麼說~

translations.en: If my English sounds weird, please let me know!
translations.zh: 如果有說的英文很奇怪請跟我說XD

translations.en: Do you enjoy coding, or do you just see it as a job?
translations.zh: 您喜歡編碼，還是只是將其視為一份工作？

translations.en: I can hear your voice
translations.zh: 我聽得到你的聲音

translations.en: Last time, I remember you asked a question about unit testing in C#.
translations.zh: 上次，我記得你問了一個關於 C# 單元測試的問題。

translations.en: Did your job interview go well last time?
translations.zh: 你上次的面試順利嗎？

translations.en: Education in Taiwan involves too much rote learning.
translations.zh: 台灣的教育涉及太多的死記硬背。

translations.en: I'm dead, you're so good at guessing.
translations.zh: 笑死，你猜得太準了。

translations.en: Trust me, you are better than me.
translations.zh: 相信我，你比我更好。

translations.en: I believe this may cause problems, I recommend synchronizing the names.
translations.zh: 我相信這可能會引起問題,我建議同步名稱。

translations.en: Is it possible to work fully remotely at [Hsu Shen]'s company?
translations.zh: 在[徐深]的公司可以完全遠距工作嗎?

translations.en: Okay, let's practice English together!
translations.zh: 好喔，我們一起練習英文吧！

translations.en: I'm really a rookie, I never pretend to be otherwise.
translations.zh: 我真的是個新手，我從不假裝不是。

translations.en: You are my idol.
translations.zh: 你是我的偶像。

translations.en: Yes, I was born in Taiwan.
translations.zh: 是的，我出生在台灣。

translations.en: Because I've had a slight cold recently.
translations.zh: 因為我最近有點感冒。

translations.en: Long time no see, how have you been?
translations.zh: 好久不見，你過得怎麼樣？

translations.en: I added (Promise.all and db_usestate) to check if the data has been loaded.
translations.zh: 我添加了（Promise.all 和 db_usestate）來檢查數據是否已加載。

translations.en: Move the function to a shared file.
translations.zh: 將函數移動到共享文件。

translations.en: Convert a standalone useState boolean to a useState object.
translations.zh: 將獨立的 useState 布爾值轉換為一個 useState 對象。

translations.en: Add voice translation feature.
translations.zh: 添加語音翻譯功能。

translations.en: Modify CSS styles and layout.
translations.zh: 修改 CSS 樣式和佈局。

translations.en: No special reason, just studying for work.
translations.zh: 沒有特別的原因，只是為工作學習。

translations.en: I switched my phone and computer to English mode to practice English.
translations.zh: 我將手機和電腦切換到英文模式來練習英文。

translations.en: You are gorgeous.
translations.zh: 你真漂亮。

translations.en: Incorporate several new sentences into the JSON file.
translations.zh: 將幾個新句子納入 JSON 檔案中。

translations.en: Modify the copy function prompt message.
translations.zh: 修改複製功能的提示訊息。

translations.en: Good evening, Big Rabbit.
translations.zh: 晚上好，大兔子。

translations.en: The triggers for my PTSD are usually not subjects, but people and teachers.
translations.zh: 觸發我的創傷後壓力症候群的通常不是主題，而是人和老師。

translations.en: I specially created a web application to learn English.
translations.zh: 我為了學英文特地做了一個網頁應用程式。

translations.en: Every day, I'm doing my best.
translations.zh: 每一天，我都在盡我最大的努力。

translations.en: Please introduce me to a girl who can save me years of struggle.
translations.zh: 請介紹一個能讓我少奮鬥幾年的女孩。

translations.en: I also think so.
translations.zh: 我也是這樣想。

translations.en: Now, when I'm confessing my feelings to you.
translations.zh: 現在，當我向你坦白我的感情時。

translations.en: In my heart, Casper, my senior, is the most awesome.
translations.zh: 在我心裡，我的學長 Casper 是最香的。

translations.en: Well, that depends. Are you ready for a little adventure?
translations.zh: 這取決於情況。你準備好迎接一點冒險了嗎？

translations.en: Sure, why not? Anything's possible if you're brave enough.
translations.zh: 當然可以，為什麼不呢？只要你足夠勇敢，一切皆有可能。

translations.en: Of course, as long as you're brave enough to try.
translations.zh: 當然可以，只要你敢嘗試。

translations.en: If I only have the frontend without backend server support, what methods can I use to store data on the client side?
translations.zh: 如果我只有前端，沒有後端服務器支援，那麼我可以使用什麼方法在客戶端存儲資料?

translations.en: How can I prepare for a technical interview?
translations.zh: 我該如何為技術面試做準備？

translations.en: Can you give me some tips for improving my programming skills?
translations.zh: 你能給我一些提高編程技能的建議嗎？

translations.en: Always placing others' priorities first, and leaving myself for last.
translations.zh: 總是把別人的優先放在前面，把自己擺到最後。

translations.en: Don't hesitate, just take off with no regrets?
translations.zh: 別猶豫，盡管出發，毫無遺憾地去吧！

translations.en: Did the company you interviewed with last time not accept you?
translations.zh: 上次面試的公司沒有錄取你嗎？

translations.en: I'm waiting for you to introduce girls to me.
translations.zh: 我等著你跟我介紹女孩子。

translations.en: With this tool, my English skills are bound to improve.
translations.zh: 有了這個工具，我的英語程度一定會提升。

translations.en: The most important thing during the interview is to be in a good mood.
translations.zh: 面試的時候最重要的是心情好。

translations.en: I haven't opened VRChat in at least a year.
translations.zh: 我至少有一年沒有打開 VRChat 了。

translations.en: I don't want to teach others bad habits.
translations.zh: 我不想教別人壞習慣。

translations.en: Don't worry about this problem.
translations.zh: 不用擔心這個問題。

translations.en: I have several questions about this issue.
translations.zh: 對於這個問題我有幾個疑問。

translations.en: I like white, it gives me a sense of innocence, optimism and a very sacred feeling
translations.zh: 我喜歡白色，它給我一種純真、樂觀和一種很神聖的感覺

translations.en: This is what I created from scratch
translations.zh: 這是我從頭開始創建的

translations.en: I practice English very hard.
translations.zh: 我非常努力地練習英語。

translations.en: Excuse me, are you referring to me?
translations.zh: 打擾一下，您指的是我嗎？？

translations.en: I want to ask who got this job QQ?
translations.zh: 我想問一下誰得到了這個工作 QQ？

translations.en: Show favorites list only
translations.zh: 僅顯示收藏夾列表

translations.en: What does this mean?
translations.zh: 這是什麼意思？

translations.en: I will take a look.
translations.zh: 我會看一下

translations.en: You are a special girl to me.
translations.zh: 對我來說你是個很特別的女孩。

translations.en: If there really is no way, I suggest...
translations.zh: 如果真的沒有辦法,我建議...

translations.en: so why do we still need bundlers?
translations.zh: 所以為什麼我們還需要捆綁器？

translations.en: It is hard to say
translations.zh: 這個不好說

translations.en: I don't know how to say this, but...
translations.zh: 我不知道該怎麼說，但...

translations.en: But I said it badly
translations.zh: 但我說的很差

translations.en: I have no AWS experience
translations.zh: 我沒有AWS的經驗

translations.en: I don't know what to say
translations.zh: I don't know

translations.en: Thanks for talking to me
translations.zh: 謝謝你與我交談

translations.en: Sorry, I forgot, I can't answer you
translations.zh: 對不起，我忘記了，我不能回答你

translations.en: It will take a lot of time
translations.zh: 這會花很多時間

translations.en: Because we have more than 10 kinds of projects
translations.zh: 因為我們有10種以上的專案

translations.en: But I think I still need someone to talk to me
translations.zh: 但我認為我還是需要人跟我講話

translations.en: I will watch movies and comics to study
translations.zh: 我會看電影與漫畫學習

translations.en: I'm not used to speaking English
translations.zh: 我不習慣講英文

translations.en: How've you been?
translations.zh: 最近怎麼樣？

translations.en: Shouldn't you go to bed?
translations.zh: 你不應該去睡覺嗎？

translations.en: It's been a while
translations.zh: 有一陣子了

translations.en: I will fully cooperate with you
translations.zh: 我將全力配合您
